ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Sex : 男性 Race : Caucasian Old Clas : Enclave

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Forward - Fly forward. Run & Forward - Fly forward at full speed. Left - Strafe left. Right - Strafe right. Back - Fly backwards. Jump - Ascend. Crouch - Descend. Activate & Crouch - Land. Attack - Fire primary weapon. Aim/Block - Fire secondary weapon. Ready/Reload - Open primary weapon selection menu. Pip-Boy - Open secondary weapon selection menu. Wait - Toggle HUD. VATS - Toggle target highlights. Auto-Move - Play appropriate music.
The Vertibird will self repair at a rate of 1% HP per second while in the air, and 2% HP per second while on the ground, and there is a warning siren once health falls below 10%.
Keep in mind that if you land while the Vertibird is damaged you will not be able to pilot or summon/dismiss it until the damage is fully repaired.
ESP.TRADUIT:
前 - 向前飞行 跑动与前进 - 全速向前飞行。 左 - 向左平移。 右 - 向右平移。 后 - 向后飞行。 跳跃 - 上升。 蹲下 - 下降。 激活与蹲下 - 着陆. 攻击 - 发射主武器。 瞄准/防御 - 发射副武器。 准备/重新装填 - 打开主武器选择菜单。 哔哔小子 - 打开副武器选择菜单。 等待 - 切换HUD。 VATS - 切换目标高亮显示。 自动移动 - 播放适当的音乐。
飞鸟在空中时每秒自动回复1%的生命值，在地面上时每秒回复2%的生命值，当生命值低于10%时，会发出警告警笛声。
请注意，如果飞鸟在受损状态下着陆，在完全修复前你将无法驾驶或召唤/解散它。

ESP.ORIGINAL: 25 Scrap Metal 19 Scrap Electronics 15 Boxes of Abraxo Cleaner 10 Conductors 5 Sensor Modules 2 Fission Batteries
ESP.TRADUIT: 25块废金属 19块电子废料 15箱阿伯莱萨清洁剂 10个导管 5个传感器模块 2块核裂变电池

ESP.ORIGINAL: Your next line is, "I lost my marker binoculars again."
ESP.TRADUIT: 你的下一句话是："我又把我的标记望远镜弄丢了。"

ESP.ORIGINAL: Can't talk now, got a bird to fly!
ESP.TRADUIT: 现在不能说话，有只鸟要飞！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([040019AB]PVHQuest1) Fixin' Her Up EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Player Vertibird.esm\PVHJenkinsVoice\PVHQuest1_GREETING_00002B65_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why hello there youngin'. What can I do for ya?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你好呀，年轻人。我能为你做点什么？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([040019AB]PVHQuest1) Fixin' Her Up EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Player Vertibird.esm\PVHJenkinsVoice\PVHQuest1_GREETING_00001C8F_1.ogg
Quest : ([040019AB]PVHQuest1) Fixin' Her Up EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Player Vertibird.esm\PVHJenkinsVoice\PVHQuest1_GREETING_0000375E_1.ogg
Quest : ([040019AB]PVHQuest1) Fixin' Her Up EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Player Vertibird.esm\PVHJenkinsVoice\PVHQuest1_GREETING_0000375D_1.ogg
Quest : ([040019AB]PVHQuest1) Fixin' Her Up EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Player Vertibird.esm\PVHJenkinsVoice\PVHQuest1_GREETING_00001C95_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What can I do for ya?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([040019AB]PVHQuest1) Fixin' Her Up EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Player Vertibird.esm\PVHJenkinsVoice\PVHQuest1_GREETING_00001C96_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Just... be careful where you swing that.
ESP.TRADUIT: 只是...挥动的时候小心点儿。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Feel free to practice swinging back there, just... don't hit anything.
ESP.TRADUIT: 请尽管在后边练习挥动，只是...别打到东西。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You fool! You'll kill both of us!
ESP.TRADUIT: 你这个笨蛋！你会把我们都害死的！

ESP.ORIGINAL: You fool! You'll kill all of us!
ESP.TRADUIT: 你这个笨蛋！你会把我们都害死的！

ESP.ORIGINAL: Are you trying to undo the work I did?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你是想破坏我的工作成果吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're going to damage something important, please stop!
ESP.TRADUIT: 你会损坏重要物品的，请停下来！

ESP.ORIGINAL: Having any fun adventures out there?
ESP.TRADUIT: 在外面有没有遇到什么有趣的冒险？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I hope you are having a good night.
You are not looking so well.
Oh my... Is it your birthday or something?
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦我的天...今天是你的生日吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I must say you are positively glowing today!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我必须说，你今天真是容光焕发！

ESP.ORIGINAL: I see you brought a dog on-board, just please clean up after him. Dog hair tends to get everywhere in here!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我看到你带了一只狗上船，不过请记得清理它的排泄物。狗毛很容易到处都是！

ESP.ORIGINAL: How strange, I've never seen a robot like this before.
ESP.TRADUIT: 真奇怪，我以前从未见过这样的机器人。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm afraid it might be a bit cramped for your mutant friend back there.
ESP.TRADUIT: 恐怕你的变异朋友坐在后面会有些拥挤。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Let your friend know that I don't serve alcohol on this flight.
ESP.TRADUIT: 让你的朋友知道，这架飞机上不提供酒精饮料。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ah, you're that repairman from Black Mountain, right? Heard about you on the radio.
ESP.TRADUIT: 啊，你是那位来自黑山的修理工，对吧？在广播上听说过你。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hey, Raul? While you're here could you take a look at something for me?
ESP.TRADUIT: 嘿，劳尔？既然你来了，能帮我看看这个东西吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Wait a moment, Arcade? Is that you? I don't know why, but Jenkins told me about you, were you two friends or something?
ESP.TRADUIT: 等一下，阿卡德？是你吗？我不知道为什么，但詹金斯跟我提起过你，你们认识吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: There's something a bit off with your friend there. She keeps looking at everything really carefully for some reason.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你的朋友有点不对劲。她不知为何一直仔细地查看着周围的一切。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Your friend asked if she could do an internal examination of me. I politely declined.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你朋友问能否对我进行内部检查。我礼貌地拒绝了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: First Recon, eh? Think you hit a target from a moving Vertibird?
ESP.TRADUIT: 是第一侦察营吧？认为你能从移动的飞鸟上击中目标吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't mean to alarm you, but it seems some insects have gotten on-board.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不想让你担心，但似乎有些昆虫已经上船了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hello fellow robot, how do you do?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你好，机器人伙伴，你好吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Zero One Zero Zero One Zero Zero Zero Zero One One Zero One Zero Zero One
ESP.TRADUIT: 零一零零一零零零零零一一零一零零一

ESP.ORIGINAL: Earlier I overheard someone wishing for a nuclear winter. Who in their right mind would want that?
ESP.TRADUIT: 刚才我无意间听到有人许愿想要核冬天。谁会想要这个？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I overheard that Mr. House was taken care of. I wonder who did that.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我无意间听到豪斯先生被处理了。我想知道是谁干的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I've picked up another Vertibird doing what appears to be practice flights up near Mount Charleston. Would you happen to know anything about that?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我发现了另一架飞鸟，它似乎在查尔斯顿山附近进行飞行训练。你知道这件事吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Rumor has it that the Brotherhood are in the region. I hope they don't take an interest in this Vertibird.
ESP.TRADUIT: 据说兄弟会的人已经在这个区域了。我希望他们别对这架飞鸟感兴趣。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Earlier I saw a massive ping on the radar, flight patterns matched with a B-29 bomber. You had something to do with that, didn't you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 刚才我在雷达上看到了一个巨大的信号，飞行模式与B-29轰炸机相匹配。那和你有关吧？

ESP.ORIGINAL: It seems the battle for Hoover Dam is right around the corner. When the time comes, I will assist you with the Vertibird should you need it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 看来胡佛大坝的战斗就在眼前了。一旦时机来临，如果你需要，我会用飞鸟协助你。

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([040019AB]PVHQuest1) Fixin' Her Up EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Player Vertibird.esm\PVHJenkinsVoice\PVHQuest1_GOODBYE_00003A3C_1.ogg
Quest : ([040019AB]PVHQuest1) Fixin' Her Up EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Player Vertibird.esm\PVHJenkinsVoice\PVHQuest1_GOODBYE_00001CA1_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'll most likely still be here if you need anything.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你需要任何东西，我很可能还在这里。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([040019AB]PVHQuest1) Fixin' Her Up EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\Player Vertibird.esm\PVHJenkinsVoice\PVHQuest1_GOODBYE_00001CA2_1.ogg
Quest : ([040019AB]PVHQuest1) Fixin' Her Up EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Player Vertibird.esm\PVHJenkinsVoice\PVHQuest1_GOODBYE_00003A3D_1.ogg
Quest : ([040019AB]PVHQuest1) Fixin' Her Up EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Player Vertibird.esm\PVHJenkinsVoice\PVHQuest1_GOODBYE_00001CA3_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Alright... you get one more chance.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧...我再给你一次机会。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Alright, time for you to be evicted!
ESP.TRADUIT: 好了，是时候把你赶出去了！

ESP.ORIGINAL: And to think you would try this after everything I've done for you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 在我为你做了那么多事之后，你竟然还想这样？

ESP.ORIGINAL: This is precisely why I hate it out here!
ESP.TRADUIT: 这就是为什么我讨厌待在这里的原因！

ESP.ORIGINAL: I will never get used to this...
ESP.TRADUIT: 我永远都不会习惯这个...

ESP.ORIGINAL: At least in the Vertibird I don't have to see this up close...
ESP.TRADUIT: 至少，在飞鸟里，我不必这么近距离地面对这些...

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, that's enough excitement for one day.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好了，这一天的刺激已经足够了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: System reboot complete. Resuming regular operation.
ESP.TRADUIT: 系统重启完成。恢复常规操作。

ESP.ORIGINAL: This wasn't part of the plan...
I'm just trying to fix up my old bird over there. She has certainly seen better days.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我只是想修修我的老飞机，她曾经有过风光的日子。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([040019AB]PVHQuest1) Fixin' Her Up EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\Player Vertibird.esm\PVHJenkinsVoice\PVHQuest1_PVHWhy_00001C98_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why are you all the way out here in Searchlight?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你们为什么全都在探照灯外面？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Her left rotor is starting to act up. A bird or something flew into it and damaged some parts.
ESP.TRADUIT: 她的左旋翼出故障了。有只鸟或其他东西撞到了它，损坏了些部件。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([040019AB]PVHQuest1) Fixin' Her Up EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Player Vertibird.esm\PVHJenkinsVoice\PVHQuest1_PVHWhatsWrong_00001C99_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I could fix the damage if I had the parts, but I don't want to leave her here alone.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果我有那些部件，我可以修好损坏的部分，但我不想把她单独留在这儿。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([040019AB]PVHQuest1) Fixin' Her Up EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Player Vertibird.esm\PVHJenkinsVoice\PVHQuest1_PVHWhatsWrong_00001C99_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I used to be part of the Enclave way back when they still had the Oil Rig. I was a pilot there for quite some time.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我曾是英克雷的一员，那时他们还有油井。我在那儿当飞行员很长一段时间了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([040019AB]PVHQuest1) Fixin' Her Up EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Player Vertibird.esm\PVHJenkinsVoice\PVHQuest1_PVHHowFly_00001C9E_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Where did you learn to fly?
A few years after the Enclave's oil rig got destroyed the NCR needed pilots for the Vertibirds they salvaged from the wreckage of the rig.
ESP.TRADUIT: 英克雷的油井被摧毁几年后，NCR需要飞行员来驾驶他们从油井废墟中抢救出来的飞鸟。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([040019AB]PVHQuest1) Fixin' Her Up EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Player Vertibird.esm\PVHJenkinsVoice\PVHQuest1_PVHHowFly_00001FC4_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I managed to find an old pre-war pilot training manual and thought it looked fun, so I brought it to them and enlisted as a pilot.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我设法找到了一本旧的战前飞行员训练手册，觉得很有趣，于是就把它带到那儿，并报名成为了一名飞行员。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([040019AB]PVHQuest1) Fixin' Her Up EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Player Vertibird.esm\PVHJenkinsVoice\PVHQuest1_PVHHowFly_00001FC4_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I was a natural flyer and soon got my piloting license. I've been flying ever since.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我天生就是飞行员，很快就拿到了飞行员执照。从那时起，我就一直在飞行。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([040019AB]PVHQuest1) Fixin' Her Up EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Player Vertibird.esm\PVHJenkinsVoice\PVHQuest1_PVHHowFly_00001FC4_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Where did you learn to fly?
Nope, went and got my piloting license from the NCR back in California a few years after the Oil Rig got destroyed.
ESP.TRADUIT: 没有，石油钻井平台被摧毁几年后，我在加利福尼亚从NCR那里考取了飞行员执照。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([040019AB]PVHQuest1) Fixin' Her Up EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Player Vertibird.esm\PVHJenkinsVoice\PVHQuest1_PVHEnclave_00001C97_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The NCR needed pilots for all of their salvaged Vertibirds and I just so happened to "find" a pilot training manual.
ESP.TRADUIT: NCR需要为他们那些从废墟里找出来的飞鸟配备飞行员，而我刚好‘找到’了一本飞行员训练手册。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([040019AB]PVHQuest1) Fixin' Her Up EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Player Vertibird.esm\PVHJenkinsVoice\PVHQuest1_PVHEnclave_00001C97_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So even if they accuse me I can just pull out my certified NCR license and pretty much all of them will back off.
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以，就算他们指控我，我也能拿出我的NCR认证执照，他们基本都会就此作罢。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([040019AB]PVHQuest1) Fixin' Her Up EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Player Vertibird.esm\PVHJenkinsVoice\PVHQuest1_PVHEnclave_00001C97_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Aren't you worried that the NCR might try to arrest you? Flying a Vertibird is a dead give away.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你没担心过NCR可能会逮捕你吗？开飞鸟简直就是在自投罗网。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Wow thank you stranger! I can never truly repay you for fetching these for me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哇，谢谢你，陌生人！我永远也无法真正报答你为我拿这些零件来的恩情。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([040019AB]PVHQuest1) Fixin' Her Up EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Player Vertibird.esm\PVHJenkinsVoice\PVHQuest1_PVHGotParts_00001C9D_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: However, hopefully this will be ample compensation.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不过，希望这些能作为足够的报答。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([040019AB]PVHQuest1) Fixin' Her Up EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Player Vertibird.esm\PVHJenkinsVoice\PVHQuest1_PVHGotParts_00001C9D_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Now if you don't mind, I've got a Vertibird to fly!
ESP.TRADUIT: 现在，如果你不介意的话，我要去开飞鸟了！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([040019AB]PVHQuest1) Fixin' Her Up EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Player Vertibird.esm\PVHJenkinsVoice\PVHQuest1_PVHGotParts_00001C9D_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I got the parts you requested.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我把你要的零件拿来了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You'd do that? I can't really pay you that much, but thank you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你会这么做？我真的付不了你多少钱，但还是谢谢你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([040019AB]PVHQuest1) Fixin' Her Up EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Player Vertibird.esm\PVHJenkinsVoice\PVHQuest1_PVHWhatNeed_00001C9B_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Here, take this list, it'll show you everything you need.
ESP.TRADUIT: 来，拿着这张单子，上面列出了你需要的所有东西。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([040019AB]PVHQuest1) Fixin' Her Up EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Player Vertibird.esm\PVHJenkinsVoice\PVHQuest1_PVHWhatNeed_00001C9B_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What do you need to fix it? I might be able to find the parts.
ESP.TRADUIT: 需要修什么？我或许能找到零件。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh how rude of me, I'm Jenkins. I've been a pilot for several years now.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，我真粗鲁，我是詹金斯。我已经当飞行员好几年了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([040019AB]PVHQuest1) Fixin' Her Up EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Player Vertibird.esm\PVHJenkinsVoice\PVHQuest1_PVHWho_00001CA0_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well that certainly was something, wasn't it?
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯，这确实是个意外，不是吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm the co-pilot of this here Vertibird. Well, I was the co-pilot.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我是这架飞鸟的副驾驶。好吧，我曾经是副驾驶。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Certainly, however it's going to take a bit more than just 5 pounds of scrap this time, and several days worth of work.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当然，不过这次需要的可不仅仅是五磅废铁，还需要几天的时间。

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you're interested I can produce a list of needed materials.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你有兴趣，我可以列一个所需材料的清单。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Is it still possible to fix this?
ESP.TRADUIT: 这架飞机还有可能修好吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh good you decided to help, here is the list of materials.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，好的，你决定帮忙了，这是材料清单。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Don't worry about any tools, I'm loaded with a full set of maintenance gear.
ESP.TRADUIT: 别担心工具问题，我有一套完整的维修工具。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sounds good, what parts are needed?
ESP.TRADUIT: 听起来不错，需要哪些部件？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ah splendid! I'll get to work on fixing this right now.
ESP.TRADUIT: 啊，太棒了！我现在就开始修理这个。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Come back in a week and I should have everything fixed up and ready to go.
ESP.TRADUIT: 一周后回来，我应该已经修好了所有东西，准备出发了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: By the way, I know what you did.
ESP.TRADUIT: 顺便说一句，我知道你做了什么。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I have the parts you requested.
Ah splendid! I'll get to work on fixing this right now.
ESP.TRADUIT: 啊，太棒了！我现在就开始修理这个。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Come back in a week and I should have everything fixed up and ready to go.
ESP.TRADUIT: 一周后回来，我应该已经修好了所有东西，准备出发了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: By the way, I know what you did.
ESP.TRADUIT: 顺便说一句，我知道你做了什么。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You cheated not only the game, but yourself. You didn't grow. You didn't improve. You took a shortcut and gained nothing.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你不仅欺骗了游戏，还欺骗了自己。你没有成长，没有进步。你走了捷径，却一无所获。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You experienced a hollow victory. Nothing was risked and nothing was gained. It's sad that you don't know the difference.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你体验了一次空虚的胜利。你没有冒任何风险，也没有得到任何东西。可悲的是，你不知道两者的区别。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I have the parts you requested.
Ah splendid! I'll get to work on fixing this right now.
ESP.TRADUIT: 啊，太棒了！我现在就开始修理这个。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Come back in a week and I should have everything fixed up and ready to go.
ESP.TRADUIT: 一周后回来，我应该已经修好了所有东西，准备出发了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I have the parts you requested.
My official designation is JNKS, however most people refer to me as "Jinks"
ESP.TRADUIT: 我的正式名称是詹金斯，但大多数人叫我金克斯。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I was originally issued to Jenkins shortly after he received his piloting license from the NCR. So it's been close to 40 years now.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他刚从NCR拿到飞行执照后不久，我就被派给他了。现在快40年了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: How long were you Jenkins' co-pilot?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你当了多久詹金斯的副驾驶？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I have nothing better to do, so I could ferry you around in it. Treat it like a mobile base if you want.
ESP.TRADUIT: 反正我也没什么更好的事情可做，所以我可以驾驶它送你到处跑。如果你想的话，就把它当成一个移动基地。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I can also assist you in combat with it as long as you have enough ammo loaded onto it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 只要你的弹药足够，我还可以协助你作战。

ESP.ORIGINAL: If we get this fixed up what do I get in return?
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果我们修好了这个，我能得到什么回报？

ESP.ORIGINAL: And there we go, everything is done. Here take this, it'll let you summon the Vertibird whenever you need it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好了，一切都完成了。拿着这个，当你需要的时候，它可以让你召唤飞鸟。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Now if you don't mind, I'll resume my post onboard said Vertibird.
ESP.TRADUIT: 现在，如果你不介意的话，我将回到飞鸟号上继续我的工作。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Turns out that the damage to the left rotor was more severe than Jenkins anticipated.
ESP.TRADUIT: 原来左旋翼的损伤比詹金斯预想的要严重得多。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Immediately after takeoff the left wing control unit malfunctioned, causing us to spin out, but I assume you saw that already.
ESP.TRADUIT: 起飞后，左翼控制单元立刻失灵，导致我们螺旋坠落，但我想你已经看到了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Jenkins tried to compensate with the other wing, but ultimately it was too late.
ESP.TRADUIT: 詹金斯试图用另一侧的机翼来平衡，但最终还是太晚了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: He decided that the best course of action would just be to shut it down and hope for a smooth landing. Of course you know how that went.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他决定最好的做法就是关闭引擎，希望平安降落。当然，你知道结果如何。

ESP.ORIGINAL: So how did the Vertibird crash in the first place?
ESP.TRADUIT: 那飞鸟最初是怎么坠毁的？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why thank you! I take my Vertibird duty very seriously.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，谢谢！我非常认真地对待我的飞鸟职责。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Good job on fixing this up.
I managed to salvage some data from the terminals in the wreckage of the old Vertibird. However a good chunk of it was corrupted unfortunately.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我从旧飞鸟的残骸中的终端上设法挽救了一些数据。但是不幸的是，其中很大一部分都损坏了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm afraid that at this moment I can't add any new data without corrupting the archive.
ESP.TRADUIT: 恐怕此刻我无法添加任何新数据而不损坏存档。

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you have an issue with it take it up with the mod author.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你对此有异议，请找模组作者解决。

ESP.ORIGINAL: What's the deal with the destination list? Can I add new locations?
ESP.TRADUIT: 目的地列表是怎么回事？我可以添加新的位置吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I managed to salvage some data from the terminals in the wreckage of the old Vertibird. However a good chunk of it was corrupted unfortunately.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我从旧飞鸟的残骸中的终端上设法挽救了一些数据。但是不幸的是，其中很大一部分都损坏了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm afraid that at this moment I can't add any new data without corrupting the archive.
ESP.TRADUIT: 恐怕此刻我无法添加任何新数据而不损坏存档。

ESP.ORIGINAL: What's the deal with the destination list? Can I add new locations?
ESP.TRADUIT: 目的地列表是怎么回事？我可以添加新的位置吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Err... forget that I said that. I can get in serious trouble for even mentioning it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 呃...就当我没说过吧。提这件事我都可能惹上大麻烦。

ESP.ORIGINAL: But seriously, if you have suggestion leave it on the mod page.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不过说真的，如果你有建议的话，就发到模组页面上吧。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm afraid my programming prohibits me from leaving this Vertibird. Unless something major occurs of course.
ESP.TRADUIT: 恐怕我的程序限制我不能离开这只飞鸟。除非有大事发生。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why didn't you help Jenkins beforehand?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你为什么不早点帮詹金斯？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Err... Okay I admit, I can leave whenever I want. I just don't like it out there. It's just too violent for little old me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 呃...好吧，我承认，我想什么时候走就可以什么时候走。只是我不喜欢外面。那里太暴力了，我这把老骨头可受不了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I can override your programming if you'd like.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你想的话，我可以改变你的程序设定。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Err... Okay I admit, I can leave whenever I want. I just don't like it out there. It's just too violent for little old me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 呃...好吧，我承认，我想什么时候走就可以什么时候走。只是我不喜欢外面。那里太暴力了，我这把老骨头可受不了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Also there are rumors of a madman who tears apart entire settlements! I don't want any part of that!
ESP.TRADUIT: 还有传言说有个疯子会摧毁整个定居点！我可不想成为其中的一部分！

ESP.ORIGINAL: I can override your programming if you'd like.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你想的话，我可以改变你的程序设定。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well I guess you should know in case anything ever happens to me. Alright let's begin our first lesson...
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，我猜你应该知道，万一我发生什么意外的话。好的，我们开始第一课吧...

ESP.ORIGINAL: Can you teach me how to pilot this?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你能教我如何驾驶这个吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Impressive, you sure are a quick learner! If you ever need a reminder on what to do, here is a note containing the controls.
ESP.TRADUIT: 真厉害，你果然是个学东西很快的人！如果你需要提醒怎么做，这里有份包含操作指南的便签。

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's unfortunate. I guess you are S.O.L.
ESP.TRADUIT: 真不幸。我猜你这次只能自认倒霉了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Just kidding, here's another pair. Try not to loose them again.
ESP.TRADUIT: 开玩笑的，我这儿还有一对。这次可别再弄丢了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I lost my Vertibird Marker Binoculars.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我把飞鸟标记望远镜弄丢了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Again? Well, don't worry, here's another pair.
ESP.TRADUIT: 又丢了？好吧，别担心，我这儿还有一对。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I lost my Vertibird Marker Binoculars, again.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我又把飞鸟标记望远镜弄丢了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You are making a bad habit out of this, are you suffering from some form of amnesia?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你这是在养成一个坏习惯，你是不是患有某种失忆症？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Regardless, here's another one for you to inevitably misplace.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不管怎样，我再给你一对，你一定会再弄丢的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You won't believe what happened, I lost my marker binoculars again.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你不会相信的，我又把标记望远镜弄丢了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I know what you are about to say, here's a replacement.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我知道你要说什么，给你换一个。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Bizarre, isn't it? In any case, here's another replacement for you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 奇怪吧？不过，我再给你一个替代品吧。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I lost my marker binoculars again.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我又把标记用的望远镜弄丢了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Bizarre, isn't it? In any case, here's another replacement for you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 奇怪吧？不过，我再给你一个替代品吧。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I lost my marker binoculars again.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我又把标记用的望远镜弄丢了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You have exhausted my humor emitter array. Just take these and go back to doing whatever it is you do when you're not losing these.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我已经没有幽默感了。你就拿着这些，回去做你那些不丢东西时做的事情吧。

ESP.ORIGINAL: From my perspective, on the left hand side there is a crate mounted into the wall. That is where the Vertibird's ammo is stored.
ESP.TRADUIT: 从我这边看，左手边有一个嵌进墙壁的弹药箱。那是飞鸟的弹药存储箱。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Where do I load ammo for use in the Vertibird?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我在哪里装填弹药供飞鸟使用？

ESP.ORIGINAL: In order for me to assist you in combat, I need missiles and/or mini-nukes loaded.
ESP.TRADUIT: 为了协助你作战，我需要导弹或/和微型核弹头。

ESP.ORIGINAL: However, it also accepts electron charge packs, 5mm rounds, 12.7mm rounds, or 25mm grenades for use while you are piloting.
ESP.TRADUIT: 然而，当你驾驶时，它也可以接受荷电充能包、5毫米子弹、12.7毫米子弹或25毫米榴弹。

ESP.ORIGINAL: What ammo types does this bird take?
I have some questions about the Vertibird.
ESP.TRADUIT: 关于飞鸟我有几个问题。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Negative, this Vertibird is an experimental prototype model that is powered by an onboard fission reactor.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不需要，这只飞鸟是实验原型机，由机载裂变反应堆提供动力。

ESP.ORIGINAL: We have enough power to continue operating for 200 years.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们的动力足够我们继续运作200年。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You know, it's a miracle that the reactor didn't go critical earlier. I am very thankful that you opted to help me repair this.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你知道吗，反应堆之前没发生临界反应真是个奇迹。我很感激你选择帮我修复它。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Does it need any sort of fuel?
I certainly can, but I have more pressing matters to attend to. Ask again when the Vertibird is fixed.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我当然可以，但我还有更紧急的事情要处理。等飞鸟修好了你再问吧。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Wait, you said something about maintenance gear, can you fix my stuff?
ESP.TRADUIT: 等等，你刚才提到了维修工具，你能帮我修一下东西吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I certainly can, however you will still need to pay me for the parts. If you are alright with that, then all you need to do is ask.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我当然可以，但是你还是需要支付我零件的费用。如果你同意这一点，那么你只需要开口问我就行。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Earlier you said something about maintenance gear, can you fix my stuff?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你之前提到维修工具，你能帮我修一下东西吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I certainly can, however you will still need to pay me for the parts. If you are alright with that, then all you need to do is ask.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我当然可以，但是你还是需要支付我零件的费用。如果你同意这一点，那么你只需要开口问我就行。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Now that the Vertibird is fixed, can you repair my stuff?
ESP.TRADUIT: 现在飞鸟修好了，你能帮我修一下东西吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I need you to repair my gear.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我需要你帮我修理我的装备。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I need you to repair my gear.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我需要你帮我修理我的装备。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Whenever you have the Vertibird landed in towns I have some supplies delivered from nearby shops or traveling merchants.
ESP.TRADUIT: 只要飞鸟降落在镇上，我就会从附近的店铺或旅行商人那里运来一些补给品

ESP.ORIGINAL: However it's mostly parts that are needed to keep everything in working order. It is fairly expensive, you know?
ESP.TRADUIT: 不过大部分都需要零件来保持设备运转正常。你知道的，这相当昂贵。

ESP.ORIGINAL: What do you need these caps for?
Generic setup for alternative starting locations.
ESP.TRADUIT: 为替代起始位置设置通用设置。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Find 3 Scrap Metal and 2 Scrap Electronics for Jenkins.
ESP.TRADUIT: 为詹金斯找到3块废金属和2块电子废料。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Check to see if Jenkins survived the crash.
ESP.TRADUIT: 检查詹金斯是否在这场事故中幸存下来。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Retrive all the items on the list and bring them back to JNKS.
ESP.TRADUIT: 取回清单上的所有物品，并将它们带给詹金斯。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Wait for the repair to complete.
Check to see if the repairs are complete.
;THIS IS NOW UNUSED - RETAINED ONLY FOR REFERENCE
ESP.TRADUIT: - 此句现已不用，仅供参考
收听莫哈韦音乐广播电台。

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Please note that once this container is closed, any appropriate ammo will be loaded into the Vertibird's weapons and will be removed from this container. All invalid objects will be returned to your inventory.
Ammo status can be viewed from the screen to the left.
ESP.TRADUIT:
请注意，一旦此容器关闭，任何合适的弹药都将被装入飞鸟的武器中，并从容器中移除。所有无效物品都将返回您的物品栏。
弹药状态可从左侧屏幕查看。

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Electron Charge Packs: %.0f 5mm Rounds: %.0f 12.7mm Rounds: %.0f 25mm Grenades: %.0f
Missiles: %.0f Mini-Nukes: %.0f
ESP.TRADUIT:
荷电充能包: %.0f 5毫米弹药: %.0f 12.7毫米弹药: %.0f 25毫米榴弹: %.0f
导弹: %.0f 微型核弹: %.0f

ESP.ORIGINAL: What would you like to do?
What would you like to do?
Unable to Dismiss: Marker Binoculars Missing
ESP.TRADUIT: 无法遣散：标记双筒望远镜丢失
驾驶/遣散失败：当前正在修理中
修理（1块废金属可修复5%的进度）

ESP.ORIGINAL: As you lean in closer to investigate you surprisingly hear something moving inside. After knocking on the hull, the door slides open, and out pops what you assume to be the co-pilot.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当你靠近调查时，你惊讶地听到里面有动静。敲了敲船体后，门滑开了，出来的是你认为的副驾驶。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You can't leave the Vertibird while it's in flight!
ESP.TRADUIT: 飞鸟在飞行中，你无法离开它！

ESP.ORIGINAL: What would you like to do?
What would you like to do?

ESP.TRADUIT: 无法召唤；当前正在修复

ESP.ORIGINAL: Your Vertibird has to take off and will arrive in approximately 50 seconds.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你的飞鸟即将起飞，将在大约50秒后到达。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Your Vertibird is currently attacking, try again later.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你的飞鸟当前正在攻击中，请稍后再试。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Your Vertibird has to take off and will arrive in approximately 25 seconds.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你的飞鸟即将起飞，将在大约25秒后到达。
飞鸟导弹袭击即将来临！

ESP.ORIGINAL:
You have an outdated version of Hopper31's Vertibird Player Home installed alongside the latest version.
Please disable the Player Vertibird.esp or else you will encounter duplicate versions of everything.
ESP.TRADUIT:
你安装了Hopper31的飞鸟玩家家园的过时版本，并且该版本与最新版本共存。
请禁用Player Vertibird.esp，否则你将遇到所有事物的重复版本。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You may now leave the Vertibird.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你现在可以离开飞鸟了

ESP.ORIGINAL: You must be outdoors to command your Vertibird.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你必须在户外才能指挥你的飞鸟。

ESP.ORIGINAL:
As you open the fridge, you notice a sticker on the inside indicating it contains a General Atomics condensation collector, stating that once per week it can provide up to five free bottles of crisp purified water.
How convenient!
ESP.TRADUIT:
当你打开冰箱时，你注意到冰箱内侧有一张贴纸，上面注明冰箱内置有一个通用原子能冷凝收集器，表示它每周能提供多达五瓶免费的清澈纯净水。
真是太方便了！

ESP.ORIGINAL: You cannot command your Vertibird here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你不能在这里指挥你的飞鸟。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You have already given your Vertibird a command!
ESP.TRADUIT: 你已经给你的飞鸟下达过指令了！
加特林激光炮 - 没有弹药！
25毫米自动加农炮 - 没有弹药！

ESP.ORIGINAL: You have an outdated or nonexistent version of the JIP LN NVSE Plugin installed. Please ensure you have the latest version before continuing.
ESP.TRADUIT: 您已安装过时或不存在的JIP LN NVSE插件版本。请在继续之前确保您已安装最新版本。

ESP.ORIGINAL: PVH Error: Old JIP LN Version Detected
You have an outdated or nonexistent version of JohnnyGuitar NVSE installed. Please ensure you have the latest version before continuing.
ESP.TRADUIT: 您已安装过时或不存在的JohnnyGuitar NVSE版本。请在继续之前确保您已安装最新版本。

ESP.ORIGINAL: PVH Error: Old JohnnyGuitar NVSE Version Detected
You have an outdated or nonexistent version of UIO - User Interface Organizer installed. Please ensure you have the latest version before continuing.
ESP.TRADUIT: 您已安装过时或不存在的UIO-用户界面组织器版本。请在继续之前确保您已安装最新版本。

ESP.ORIGINAL: PVH Error: Old UIO Version Detected
There are currently no available radio stations.
ESP.TRADUIT: 目前没有可用的广播电台。
导弹发射器 - 弹药耗尽！
胖子发射器 - 弹药耗尽！
